mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq, a.ifmmName, a.ifmmId, a.ifmmPassword, a.ifmmNickName, a.ifmmBirthday, a.ifmmDefaulNy, a.ifmmRegistDate, a.ifmmDeleteDate, a.ifmmDelNy, a.ifmmEmail, a.ifmmGender, a.ifmmAddress1, a.ifmmAddress2, a.ifmmPostCode, a.ifmmTel, a.ifmmMemo FROM yuz.member a ORDER BY a.ifmmSeq desc
